# shinybatch

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A new type of reactive objects for tightly coupled variables in `shiny` apps.

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinybatch from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("shinyworks/shinybatch")
```
